quarks.execution.services

Interface ControlService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JMXControlService

    public interface ControlService
    Service that allows an oplet to provide a control mechanism.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> java.lang.String registerControl(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String alias, java.lang.Class<T> controlInterface, T control)
      Register a control bean for an oplet.
      void unregister(java.lang.String controlId)
      Unregister a control bean registered by registerControl(String, String, String, Class, Object)

    • Method Detail

      • registerControl

        <T> java.lang.String registerControl(java.lang.String type,
                                     java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String alias,
                                     java.lang.Class<T> controlInterface,
                                     T control)
        Register a control bean for an oplet.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the control object.
        id - Unique identifier for the control object.
        alias - Alias for the control object.
        controlInterface - Public interface for the control object.
        control - The control bean
        Returns:
        unique identifier that can be used to unregister an control mbean.

      • unregister

        void unregister(java.lang.String controlId)
        Unregister a control bean registered by registerControl(String, String, String, Class, Object)
